resources.string: This application supports screen saver. The first countdown in the list will be displayed in the screen saver, and you can drag and drop to reorder. At the same time, you can display notification information in the screen saver, but you need relevant permissions.
The time has started. You can choose to set the name of this time

Due to too many preferences, the previous list was too complicated to display. Therefore, the preferences are divided into three groups and displayed in pages. You can swipe left and right to switch between different preferences. After entering this page, you can swipe down to hide your preferences at any time, or you can pull up at any time to call up preferences. Preferences can be previewed instantly, but only if you click the confirmation button.
Countdown suspended windows are at your service
I am very sorry that an irreparable error has occurred. \nYou can choose to click the bottom right corner to send an error log to the developer. Help him fix this problem.
The crash log information is not received normally, and the latest local log is automatically retrieved. Please determine the time of the crash.
The app has crashed. The following is an overview of the crash.
Please select the application for sending mail
The available mailbox application was not found to send the crash log
found %1$d logs, are you sure you want to delete them all?
